definition: to receive and send/to receive and transmit
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
hair/Taiwan pr. [fa3]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
mail room/radio room (i.e. reception and transmission)
transceiver/radio frequency receiver, broadcaster or relay
pinyin: wu2 xian4 dian4 shou1 fa1 ji1

definition: transponder/electronic device that responds to a radio code
pinyin: yi4 pin2 lei2 da2 shou1 fa1 ji1

sentences.english: Someone might mail it and scan it.
sentences.chinese: 有些人可能会把它收发，扫描。

sentences.english: An ultrasonic distance measuring system with a transmitting-receipting sensor is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种收发同体型超声测距系统。

sentences.english: Pulse interleaving also avoids the mutual interference between the transmitted and received impulse pulse signals.
sentences.chinese: 脉冲交错也避免了收发冲激脉冲信号间的相互干扰。

sentences.english: Floating facility for oil loading and unloading is a new kind of operating component of an oil tank.
sentences.chinese: 浮动式泄入装置是石油储罐新型的收发油作业附件。

sentences.english: The core of the protocol, used for sending, receiving and handling e-mail, are fine.
sentences.chinese: 用于收发和处理电子邮件的协议核心没有问题。

sentences.english: Figure shows typical launching and receiving facilities.
sentences.chinese: 图表示典型的清管器收发设施。

sentences.english: So in a traditional mailroom, again the paper comes in, letters come in on mail.
sentences.chinese: 所以在传统的收发室作业中，有纸质的文件，有信件。

sentences.english: But multidrop addressing turned out to be an excellent design decision as well.
sentences.chinese: 然而集体收发也成为了一项优秀的设计决定。

sentences.english: It also boasts 55% of the global market share in 3G dongles.
sentences.chinese: 公司还称拥有3G收发器全球市场55%的份额。

sentences.english: The wireless communication revolution has spawned a revival of interest in the design and optimization of radio transceivers.
sentences.chinese: 无线通信的迅猛发展激发了射频收发器设计的热潮。

sentences.english: Now, we'll go to the post room first with the letters.
sentences.chinese: 来，我们先把这些信件送到收发室。

sentences.english: It may be the best email device I have ever owned.
sentences.chinese: 它可能是我拥有的最好的邮件收发器。

sentences.english: No matter where I go, I see people on their cellphones, messaging.
sentences.chinese: 无论我走到哪儿，都能看到人们在手机上收发短信。

sentences.english: Programs that require the ability to send or receive control characters have an environmental dependency.
sentences.chinese: 需要收发控制字元的程式是环境相依的。

sentences.english: Thus, the transceiver acts as an interface between digital and RF domains.
sentences.chinese: 因此，收发信机充当数字域和射频域之间的接口。

sentences.english: if the person is a legal person or other organization, the written decision shall be delivered to its reception office for a signed receipt.
sentences.chinese: 受送达人是法人或者其他组织的，交其收发部门签收。

unobstructed/unconstrained/smoothly/with ease/freely
data transmission

data communication
data stream/data flow
electronic exchange of data

definition: to do two things at once (idiom)/to multitask/to divide one's attention
down to the smallest detail/thoroughgoing/fine and detailed
